changes: Users can now select a date range to view historical weather data.
Historical data is displayed in an interactive chart, visualizing temperature ranges and precipitation.
Refactored state management to use React Context API for improved scalability.
Centralized all application styles and themes into a single `theme.js` file.
Implemented a fully responsive layout for mobile, tablet, and desktop views.
Fixed critical performance bugs causing infinite loops and UI flickering.
Redesigned modals and other components to match the application's 'glass' aesthetic.
Initial release of Skyline Weather application.
